page.title: 05COURT FARM
page.content:
{Mr Thompson's}family have been farming at Court Farm Dorney since 1956 and Boveney Court Farm since 1965. They rent 610 acres from Eton College. Court Farm put beef cattle on Dorney Common which get mixed up with other herds. There are commonland rights. There are three farm workers.
Court Farm has one combined harvester, four tractors, one forklift, three ploughs, one set of harrows, two sets of rolls, one sprayer, one fertilizer distributer and various cultivators. ______________________________________ {Name } ]Used for or sold to]Acres {Maize } ] Farm use ] 50 {Triticale } ] Corn merchant ] 80 {Wheat } ] " " ] 280 {Barley } ] Both ] 200 {Beans } ] Corn merchant ] 40 {Oilseed rape]}" " ] 40
